data.message: Hey Facebook management team / Company the page merge took too long and facebook help team didn't explain  clearly I want to reverse the merge I changed one of my page name back to where I had it before you took too long to give me an exact date when the merge will be done your system is broken an report took 23 sends to finally be noticed  this is bad service

replies.message: Hey Kim. For questions about ads or Pages, please reach out to our business team here: http://bit.ly/2kJonCe. Thanks! -Zack
